UTF8.JS

INTRO

The utf8.js module provides UTF-8 encoder/decoder. The size of utf8.js is 227 bytes.

API

utf8_enc(x)

Performs UTF-8 encoding

utf8_dec(x)

Performs UTF-8 decoding

utf8_arr(x)

Returns UTF-8 encoded ArrayBuffer.

You may also want to read: bert.js, heart.js, nitro.js, n2o.js.
